thread.title: Surge protection devices suit industrial, solar, wind applications
thread.title_full: Surge protection devices suit industrial, solar, wind applications

title: Surge protection devices suit industrial, solar, wind applications
text:
This article was posted on 10/08/2015 Surge protection devices suit industrial, solar, wind applications 
A full complement of UL 1449 3 rd edition recognized DIN rail-mounted pluggable surge protection devices is available to protect against transient overvoltages, spikes and impulses in industrial applications. Additionally, product offerings include devices specific to solar and wind turbines industry needs. 


The DIN rail mountable base and pluggable MOV, GDT or MOV/GDT modules offer unique voltage keying, which assures the correct plug is inserted into the correct base. These products are UL Type 4 recognized and can be use in Type 1, 2 & 3 applications. A remote alarm contact with visual indicator allows for status monitoring and quick reaction in critical situations. They are factory tested for SCCR rating of 200 kA, and are KEMA Certified to IEC 61643-11 2011, Class II.
